headline: Winners And Losers Of Q3: Invesco (NYSE:IVZ) Vs The Rest Of The Custody Bank Stocks
summary: Looking back on custody bank stocks’ Q3 earnings, we examine this quarter’s best and worst performers, including Invesco (NYSE:IVZ) and its peers.

headline: Invesco (IVZ) Valuation Check After Recent Price Move And Momentum In Shareholder Returns
summary: Invesco (IVZ) is back on investor watch after a recent move in its share price, with the stock closing at $27.69. That development is putting fresh attention on how its current valuation lines up with fundamentals. See our latest analysis for Invesco. While the latest 1-day share price return of a 2% decline to $27.69 has cooled the recent run, the 90-day share price return of 15.86% and 1-year total shareholder return of 68.90% suggest momentum has been building over a longer stretch.
